description: Why do we love to share knowledge, and what do we get into return? And, more importantly, how can we encourage others to join us? A delve into what inspires developers to help each other learn, with a sidestop into Japanese tea ceremony, internet cats, and 1,000 bacon-dipped Chuck Norris memes.
short_description: Why do we love to share knowledge, and what do we get into return? And, more importantly, how can we encourage others to join us

videos.title: Sharing code knowledge and cultural capital - when tech meets anthropology

title: Sharing code knowledge and cultural capital - when tech meets anthropology
